birdtrends: Estimate Trends Based On Modelled Annual Indices Or Related Inputs

Source: R/birdtrends-package.R
birdtrends-package.Rd

This package provides a flexible framework to generate trends, based on actual or modeled annual indices data. This package was designed to undertake assessment of 2016 Partners In Flight Landbird Conservation objectives.

See also
